title: Dawnkeepers
description: The countdown to the end of days has begun—and Only the Nightkeepers can stop the annihilation of all mankind...View our feature on Jessica Andersen’s Dawnkeepers.Though a Nightkeeper, Nate Blackhawk refuses to allow others to control his fate. The gods have even tried to influence his love life, sending him visions of Alexis Gray, a sleek blonde who is everything he’s ever wanted in a woman. The two warriors can’t deny their attraction. But a frightening vision leads Nate to distance himself in spite of the intense passion he feels. Thrown together once more, they must reassemble seven Mayan artifacts that hold the key to preventing the end of the world…
author: Jessica Andersen
